TopDown.MainPrompt: bird's eye top-down view illustration of the subject looking forward, to be seamless integrated into a virtual table top map
TopDown.NegativePrompt: facing the viewer, looking up, partial body, cut off, background elements, scenery, landscape, environment details

Photo.MainPrompt: close-up illustration of the main features of the subject, with a solid neutral background, to be used as a token on a virtual table top map
Photo.NegativePrompt: partial head, cut off, background elements, scenery, landscape, environment details

Portrait.MainPrompt: vivid portrait illustration, displaying the full view of the subject, to be used as a representation of the subject in a book or a display panel
Portrait.NegativePrompt: partial body, partial head, cropped face, distorted features, incorrect anatomy
